function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Impact of COVID-19 pandemic on biodiversity conservation","Impact":"Threat to biodiversity conservation and natural heritage","Mitigation":"Implement measures to protect conservation sites and natural habitats","Technologies":"Remote monitoring and surveillance, AI for early detection of threats","People":"Conservationists, environmentalists, and wildlife enthusiasts","Owner":"Conservation organizations, government agencies, and environmental NGOs"}]}
